function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for disease transmission in group meetings and international travel","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases leading to illness, death, and global health crises","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, vaccination requirements, and travel restrictions","Technologies":"Air purifiers, disinfection systems, and contactless technology for meetings and travel","People":"Members of international organizations, research institutions, and government bodies","Owner":"International organizations, government health departments, and travel authorities"}]}
